Title: Don't Let the Good Life Pass You By
Writer: Michael Schur (created by), Andrew Law, Cord Jefferson (executive story editor), Andrew Law (executive story editor), Daniel Schofield (executive story editor), Kassia Miller (executive story editor), Christopher Encell (story editor)
Actors: Kristen Bell, William Jackson Harper, Jameela Jamil, D'Arcy Carden
Plot: Michael and Janet take an important journey. Eleanor ponders whether she should share a secret.
